properties.name: Width
desc: contains the width of the device in pixels.

properties.name: Height
desc: contains the height of the device in pixels.

properties.name: LeftInset
desc: contains the inset from the left.

properties.name: TopInset
desc: contains the inset from the top.

properties.name: RightInset
desc: contains the inset from the right.

properties.name: BottomInset
desc: contains the inset from the bottom.

properties.name: PixelPerMeterX
desc: contains the X-axis resolution of the device in pixel/meter.

properties.name: PixelPerMeterY
desc: contains the Y-axis resolution of the device in pixel/meter.

properties.name: BitsPerPixel
desc: contains the color-depth of the device.

properties.name: Capabilities
desc: specifies special operations which are possible on the device.
